Text: bedankt lijkt me een vette film

Quick report:

Video: 9
Audio: 8(?)

I've only downloaded about 50% of the movie so can't properly watch it yet but thought I would give a quick report. The audio seems to have a bit of an echo making the dialogue a bit tough at times but it's acceptable from what I can tell.

Also, the subs seem to be soft-subs (optional).

Hoe kun je audio een 8 geven,
als het maar 2 kanaals is????

Finally finished the movie. The audio isn't as good as I had hoped, I would only rate it a 7.

Can't read that last comment, but I'm watching this on a normal TV with no sound system so the number of channels doesn't really make a big difference.

Also note that there is a part near the end where the audio language switches from English to Russian ...
With to other downloads there is the same problem. russian language at the end.

Misschien een domme vraag, 
Hoe krijg ik de ondertiteling voor elkaar? De film doet het maar zonder ondertiteling.
